attributes.action: Autism and adhd is a disability.
attributes.additional_details: Also the waiting lists for people to get diagnosed are way to long as there are not enough qualified people in the country. Also not enough support for these people that suffer with the condition
attributes.background: More financial support for people who struggle on a day to day with these conditions with many not able to work full-time hours or not work at all.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure whether you want direct financial support for people with autism and ADHD or more funding for support services. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do, or you might like to sign these petitions

Create an emergency fund for ASD (autism) & ADHD assessments
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/589677

Government funding required for an autism training support scheme
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590723

Fund specialist pathways for diagnosis and support for people with ASD
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/589063
